summary: A brash 22-year-old FBI agent trumps up charges of Communist spying against a Chinese laundryman. Ten years later, he wants to make amends to the man and his teenage daughter.
cast: Matt Dillon|Joan Chen|Elizabeth Morehead|Bruno Kirby|Teri Polo|Jack Shearer|Keone Young|Tzi Ma|Paddy Morrissey|Cully Fredricksen|Leo Downey|Jay Jacobus|Wilbur Jung|Henry Wong|Theresa Huynh|Doreen Foo Croft|David Booth|Denny Delk|James Cranna|Reigh Tuazon|Jeffrey A. Chan|Daniel Hiu Tung Chan|Conrad Tom|Howard Swain|Andrew Chow|Wallace Choy|Peter Murnik|George Guidall|Linda Chuan|Stan Egi|Frank Somerville|Lance Brady|Ed Holmes|Dihlon McManne|Nancy Fassett|Courtenay Taylor|Vincent Bagnall|Bruce Barlow|Richard Lentz
keywords: communist|chinese|fbi|witch hunt|suicide by jumping off a bridge
title: Golden Gate
